com.highsoft.highcharts.core

Class HIFunction

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.highsoft.highcharts.core.HIFunction

  • public final class HIFunction
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents the type for Javascript functions and Android callbacks in Highcharts Android Wrapper

      Simple constructor to use when creating an event
      HIFunction(java.lang.String jsFunction)
      Use this constructor if you want to put pure Javascript code as a String.

        Use this constructor if you want to put pure Javascript code as a String.

        jsFunction - example: function() { return "String representation"; }

      • HIFunction

        public HIFunction(java.lang.Runnable runnable)
        Simple constructor to use when creating an event
        Parameters:
        runnable - a callback to be invoked when an attached option is clicked

      • HIFunction

        public HIFunction(HIConsumer<HIChartContext> hiConsumer,
                  java.lang.String[] properties)
        Constructor to use when creating an event with chart properties
        Parameters:
        hiConsumer - a callback to be invoked when an attached option is clicked
        properties - properties to pull from the chart context

        function - a callback to be invoked when an attached option is clicked
        properties - properties to pull from the chart context
